text: Norman Bates is a fictional character. He first appeared in a 1960 movie called Psycho Norman Bates as a young man killed people in the hotel called The Bates Motel. He killed his mother by poisoning her tea. After she was buried he dug her up and would talk to himself in her voice. He then was soon arrested. Category:Dissociative identity disorder in fiction Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1950s Category:Fictional murderers Category:Horror movie characters
title: Norman Bates
